summary: Hyperscalers (Microsoft, Google, Meta, Amazon) are aggressively increasing AI infrastructure investments in their latest 2024/2025 capex guidance, signaling strong demand. H100/A100 GPU rental prices remain stable at premium levels ($3.20/hr), indicating sustained demand exceeding supply. No major new model releases (e.g., GPT-5, Gemini 2) have been confirmed or heavily rumored in the immediate term.
